The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[4 December]] [[1963]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Miss Clark'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 613</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Discussing ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]'' and ''[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth]]'', and the design for the dustwrapper for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=66210 English Language and Literature. 1990] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 18 November 2011)</ref>
*'''Description:''' 3 pages, 8vo, Headington.<ref name=Sothe/>
*'''Publication:''' A reproduction of one page and some quotes from the letter appeared in ''[[Sotheby's English Literature and History 19 July 1990]]''.<ref name=Sothe>''[[Sotheby's English Literature and History 19 July 1990]]'', p. 130</ref>
